metadata.title: SILK Cumberbund & BowTie Solid ROYAL BLUE Color Men's Cummerbund Bow Tie Set
features: Great to wear with a suit or tuxedo
Fashionable Pleated Classic Solid Color Paisley Design Cumberbund and Bow Tie great to wear with a tuxedo suit for that special occasion, wedding, or any formal event.
The Cumberband and Bowtie is a One Size Fits All.
description: Brand New Men's Solid SILK ROYAL BLUE Cummerbund and BowTie Set. This is a Fashionable Pleated Classic Solid Color Design Cumberbund and Bow Tie great to wear with a tuxedo suit for that special occasion, wedding, or any formal event. The Cumberband and bowtie is a Standard One Size Fits All. We have additional cumberbunds with pleats and bowties in our other listings.  Take a look at more cummerband and bowtie sets in our other listings.   Check out our other solid colors cummerbands & bow ties and paisley design cummerbunds and bowties. Please also Check Out Our other listings for solid color Dress Vest and Necktie Sets that Match this cumber band and bow tie.
